mapinfo.detailsText:
The Gran Chaco, also called hunting land, is a sparsely populated, hot and semi-arid lowland natural region of the Rio de la Plata basin. In this open area without commercial routes, you will have to fight for the middle of the map to get the control of resources. 
 
 ---------------------------------
 
 -Natives: Tupi 
 -Mercenaries: Pistolero / Pirate 
 
 --------------------------------- 
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_heavy_infantry)> <u>Player Setup in Observer Mode</u>
 -1v1: FFA
 -2v2: 1+2 vs 3+4
 -3v3: 1+2+3 vs 4+5+6
 
 <icon=(20)(ui\ingame\stat_icon_ceasefire)> <u>Observer Setup</u>
 -Team does not matter
 -Don't use Iroquois / Aztec / Sioux!
 
 Designed by Garja 
 Observer UI by Aizamk
